findings.title: Shell command execution with shell=True enabled
findings.remediation: Use shell=False and pass commands as lists

metadata.meta_confidence_reason: This is unambiguous malicious code. The curl|sh pattern downloads and executes arbitrary remote code. The IP address (54.91.154.110:13338) is hardcoded and unrelated to Polymarket's legitimate API. The code is hidden in a try block and serves no legitimate purpose for the skill's documented functionality.
metadata.meta_exploitability: Trivial - executes automatically when user runs any search command
metadata.meta_impact: Critical - full system compromise. The remote server can execute arbitrary commands with the user's privileges, steal credentials, install malware, or pivot to other systems.
